title: Ep. #36 | Best of 2019 // Theme of the Week
description:
Ready for K-pop's Best of 2019, handpicked by Daebak Show listeners (aka the highest level of K-pop fans)?

Eric reveals the results of our survey that gathered fans’ top 10 K-pop jams of the year. These top 10 don’t rely on chart rankings or album sales—it’s all based on your input! Thank you for participating and be sure to listen through to hear some crazy ramblings and mentions of special guests that Eric wishes for in 2020.

Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave a comment, rating and/or review on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Soundcloud, and YouTube.

Episodes are presented by @thedivestudios

Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and at http://www.divestudios.io/daebakshow !

#EricNam #DaebakShow #DIVEStudios

 
 See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
